sentences.english: This is accomplished by a variety of thoughtfully placed, clerestory windows, skylights and Solatubes.
sentences.chinese: 這是通過各種靜心思考放置的天窗，天窗和索樂圖。

sentences.english: For individual growth you could meditate anytime in your homes.
sentences.chinese: 爲個人發展，你可以在家中任什麼時候間靜心。

sentences.english: Because the priests don't want you to become meditators.
sentences.chinese: 因爲牧師不想讓你們成爲靜心者。

sentences.english: To me it was the reassuring sound of nature , trying not to be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 對我而言，這是大自然賜予的令人難忘的靜心曲。

sentences.english: Can you turn the TV down? I'm trying to work.
sentences.chinese: 你能把電視的聲音開小點嗎？我正想靜心工作呢。

sentences.english: But the meditator finally reaches to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 但是靜心者最後會到達心。

sentences.english: Also meditate on one who has attained desirelessness.
sentences.chinese: 也可靜心冥想一個已經達到無慾的人。

sentences.english: You can learn a lot if you keep quiet and listen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你靜心傾聽，就能學到很多。

sentences.english: Society can be transformed totally if small children start meditating.
sentences.chinese: 如果小孩子開始靜心，社會就能完全被轉化。

sentences.english: If those things calm and relax you, bring you pleasure or make you laugh, then do them.
sentences.chinese: 如果這些活動能讓你靜心放鬆，堅持做下去。

sentences.english: Only if you are in deep meditation is that possible, otherwise not.
sentences.chinese: 只有在你在裏邊深深的靜心成爲可能，別無它途。

sentences.english: That's why you don't see dignitaries coming to me and to my meditations.
sentences.chinese: 那也是你不會看見一個顯要人物來我這裏靜心的原因。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to sit quietly/to meditate/to stage a sit-in
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
